title: Green Energy UK joins Electric Nation V2G project as energy partner
lead: ​The Electric Nation vehicle-to-grid (V2G) project run by Western Power Distribution (WPD) and CrowdCharge has added Green Energy UK as an energy partner.
author: Alice Grundy

title: National Grid ESO issues second EMN in a week
lead: ​National Grid ESO has once again issued an Electricity Margin Notice (EMN), its second this week and fifth this winter.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: 'Enormous potential' for V2G to create power system cost savings of up to £885m per year
lead: ​Nissan, E.On and Imperial College London have release a new white paper detailing the benefits of vehicle-to-grid (V2G) technology.
author: Alice Grundy

title: Ofgem opens investigation into Symbio Energy over ‘unacceptable’ late RO payments
lead: ​Symbio Energy is being investigated by Ofgem over late Renewables Obligation and feed-in tariff (FiT) payments.
author: Alice Grundy

title: Balancing Mechanism hits £3,000/MWh as margins remain tight through cold snap
lead: ​Great Britain’s tumultuous energy week has continued, with system tightness leading to West Burton B being called at £3,000/MWh yesterday (6 January).
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Importance of low carbon heat heralded as Legal & General makes second investment
lead: ​Legal & General has made another investment into low carbon heat, with LGIM Real Assets providing debt finance to renewables funding scheme HeatRHIght.
author: Alice Grundy

title: WPD hails ‘unprecedented’ engagement for latest future energy scenarios projection
lead: ​Western Power Distribution (WPD) has released its latest mapped projection of how the energy network of the future will look across its service area.
author: Jules Scully

title: Smarter Grid Solutions to provide active network management in project set to save networks £250m
lead: ​Smarter Grid Solutions (SGS) is to provide active network management in a project looking to free up network capacity for over 2GW of clean energy assets and save networks over £250 million.
author: Alice Grundy

title: ENGIE increases investment in ‘ingenious’ storage company Connected Energy
lead: ​ENGIE New Ventures has increased its strategic investment in second-life battery company Connected Energy.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Power prices reach record high as tight margins drive N2EX beyond £1000/MWh
lead: ​Power prices have spiked to a record level for this afternoon, as cold weather and low wind tighten margins again.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Ecotricity ranked UK’s worst EV charging network while Tesla comes out on top
lead: ​Zap-Map has released its annual electric vehicle (EV) charging network satisfaction ranking, with Tesla holding onto the top spot.
author: Alice Grundy

title: 350% spike in sales in December rounds off 'bumper year' for BEVs
lead: ​Battery electric vehicle (BEV) sales saw significant growth in 2020, with a 343.7% increase in December 2020.
author: Alice Grundy

title: Ofgem approves BMRS as reporting service for GB following EU exit
lead: In an open letter, Ofgem has approved the use of the Balancing Mechanism Reporting Service (BMRS) for Great Britain following Brexit.
author: Alice Grundy

title: UKPN comes in top spot in international smart grids index
lead: ​UK Power Networks has come out on top of the SP Group’s Smart Grid Index (SGI) for 2020, jumping ahead of last year's winner, US company PG&E.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: National Grid ESO issues another Electricity Margin Notice as temperatures drop
lead: ​National Grid ESO has once again issued an Electricity Margin Notice (EMN) as tight demand is predicted for this evening.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Smart Power Systems welcomes former GE Grid Solutions CEO as director
lead: ​Former president and CEO of GE Grid Solutions has joined battery storage and power electronics specialist Smart Power Systems.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Ecotricity signs PPA to become first UK supplier of geothermal electricity
lead: ​Ecotricity has hailed a UK first, signing an agreement for geothermal power with Geothermal Engineering.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: ScottishPower hails milestone as 1MW battery exports for the first time
lead: ScottishPower Renewables’ 1MW Cornwall battery energy storage system has exported electricity for the first time, marking a significant milestone for the company's pipeline.
author: Alice Grundy

title: Clean energy professionals once again recognised in New Year’s Honours list
lead: ​Once again, energy professionals and companies have been recognised in the new New Year’s Honours list.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Why the ‘energy-mobility nexus’ holds the keys to the clean, green cities of the future
lead: As EV uptake grows, the potential strain on the electricity grid is becoming clearer, but there are clear ways to address this ‘energy-mobility nexus’ challenge writes Hitachi ABB’s Andre Burdet.
author: Andre Burdet
